let UserInput = () => { let submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() //prevent browser default behaviour console.log("Submit") } let resetHandler = () => { console.log("Reset") } // global input handler let inputChangeHandler = (input, value) =>{ console.log(input, value) } return (

{inputChangeHandler}} id="current-savings" />

); }; export default UserInput;
